name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Angular Engineer with 8 years of Full Stack Development experience, I have honed my skills in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, and **Tailwind**, focusing on designing responsive, mobile-compatible web applications. My background in Agile and Scrum methodologies facilitates seamless collaboration within cross-functional teams, ensuring efficient delivery and problem-solving throughout the development lifecycle.
I possess a comprehensive technical skill set in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, complemented by extensive cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**. My expertise includes building high-performance solutions in healthcare and financial sectors, integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing.
Additionally, I have a strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring the applications I develop are robust, secure, and compliant with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My hands-on experience also extends to developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
